summary: Creates a weapon that does 10 points of Fire Frost and Shock damage.
descriptionHtml:
This is the Backfire Version of the Blade of Elements.

The Blade of Elements is a mod that adds a new weapon, the Elemental Blade. This version of the mod gives the weapon 10 points of Fire, Frost, and Shock damage along with a swing speed of 1.5, as opposed to the normal 1. This version is different from the other two (Epic Version && Progression Version) as for it has a chance of backfiring the effects, depending on your destruction skill. 0-24 = 10%, 25-49 = 5%, 50-74 = 3%, 75-99 = 1%, 100 = 0% plus extra damage.

The weapon has unlimited charge.
The weapon can be found in Bleak Falls Barrow, lying on the table in the room with the Thu\'um word wall.
The weapon is based on a daedric sword. I do not retexture items, but if anyone who does would like to, let me know.

The Epic version is the same as this version, without the chance of backfire. (UPLOADED)

The Progression version increases its elemental damage depending on your current destruction skill. (UPLOADED)
author: DeanCarter
